main event: Observers reported sighting an unusual object in the sky that appeared to be illuminated and moving slowly in a straight line before disappearing after about 2 minutes.
interesting points: The object was described as being approximately 30 feet in diameter and hovering silently., The object moved off very slowly after being spotted., The sighting lasted for about 2 minutes., Two witnesses confirmed the sighting., There was speculation that the object could have been a balloon or aircraft due to insufficient data for evaluation.
sighted object: an illuminated object in the sky
witness description: The witnesses observed the object while coming to their cabin, noting its unusual behavior and size.
